Description: Amulet of an ape: a standing cyno-cephalus ape in relief, facing right in opaque lavender-blue glass, matt surface. His arms are raised in adoration. Doubtless, originally one of a pair. There is a narrow base under the feet.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: C. Andrews, 'Amulets of Ancient Egypt' (London 1994), fig.66
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
